long_description: This 1-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water, first-aid items and tools to help you get through 72 hrs. following a major emergency. All items are packed into a rugged backpack, making the kit easy to take along on your travels. Nutrition items include 1 emergency food bar and 12 drinking water pouches. First-aid items include bandages, sting relief pad, antiseptic towelletes and hand wipes. Hygiene items include tissues, toothbrush, toothpaste, bar soap, comb, shampoo and sanitary pads. Survival tools include a heavy-duty backpack, emergency poncho, emergency blanket, hand warmers, carabiner, whistle, duct tape and a dust mask. Lifeline Disaster kit also has waterproof matches, gloves with grippy dimples, flashlight, 2 AA batteries, emergency candles, manual can opener and a utility knife.
short_description: This 1-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water, first-aid items and tools to help you get through 72 hrs. following a major emergency.
